name: megalithic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to megaliths (= ancient large stones, sometimes forming a group or circle), or the period when these were important: megalithic monuments megalithic times See
megalith
More examplesFewer examplesHis research concentrated on megalithic tombs.They lived in villages, grew wheat and barley, and buried their dead in megalithic graves.The stones at Carnac are the world's largest megalithic site.
